content: This is a bit embarrassing, but recently... {A叹气}I learned how to <style=Highlight>sigh</style>! <style=SizeSmall>My thesis deadline is approaching...</style>

content: {A心虚目移}Yeep, I hope you won't need to do it, but... Sometimes, letting out a long sigh can be quite therapeutic. You should give it a try~!

content: <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, Esassani mentioned something about you visiting the Galactic Bazaar soon? I heard you'll find friends from all over the universe there.
